sections.section_instructions:
There are 5 advertisements A-E on the next page.

Answer the questions below by writing the letters of the appropriate advertisements in boxes 1-6 on your answer sheet.

questions.question_text: Which advertisement is not for a restaurant?
Which advertisement offers facilities for parties up to 90 people?
Which restaurant states that it serves breakfast?
Which restaurant will give you an extra serving if you present the coupon?
Which restaurant does not offer a takeaway service?
Which restaurant will bring the food you order to your house?

sections.section_instructions:
The following text is a series of general instructions for using a microwave oven.

Part of each instruction is underlined. In boxes 7-12 on your answer sheet write:

E. if the underlined section gives an EXAMPLE of the instruction
R. if the underlined section gives a REASON for the instruction
CP. if the underlined section is a CORRECT PROCEDURE.

questions.question_text: Whilst heating liquids which contain air (e.g. milk or milk-based fluids), stir several times during heating to avoid spillage of the liquid from the container.
Potatoes, apples, egg yolks, whole squash and sausages are all foods with non-porous skins. This type of food must be pierced before cooking, to prevent bursting.
Do not dry clothes or other materials in the oven. They may catch on fire.
Do not cook food directly on a glass oven tray unless indicated in recipes. Food should be placed in a suitable cooking utensil.
Do not hit the control panel. Damage to controls may occur.
Clean the oven, the door and the seals with water and a mild detergent at regular intervals.

sections.section_instructions:
Below is a chart containing some of the Kuringai Chase Park Nature Activities.

Fill in the blanks using information from the brochure 'Guided Walks and Nature Activities'.

Write NO MORE THAN THREE WORDS in boxes 13-20 on your answer sheet.
